articles.title: Shameless challenge to justice and truth = KCNA commentary =
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean chief executive's "dialogue with people"
articles.content:
Shameless challenge to justice and truth = KCNA commentary =
Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government decided to totally deny the ruling of the Yamaguchi district court that it should make state compensations to former "Comfort Women for the Japanese Army" and lodged an intermediate appeal with the Hiroshima high court on May 8, according to a news report.
   Enraging people, this is a shameless challenge to justice and truth.
   As already reported, the Yamaquchi district court in Japan recently made a comparatively fair decision that the Japanese government should compensate 300,000 yen to each of three "comfort women" of South Korean origin who brought lawsuits for compensation against it. Though belated and partial, it can be said to be fortunate for the conscience of humankind, who values justice, truth and human rights.
   Nevertheless, the Japanese government lodged an intermediate appeal in defiance of elementary human ethics, morality and international law. This reveals that the moral inferiority and shamelessness of the present Japanese authorities have already reached the extremity of subhumanity.
   The criminal "comfort women" case, which was recorded as an unprecedented disgrace in human history, is a monstrous rape committed by the Japanese imperialists with the connivance of the government. In those days, the Japanese imperialists established the unprecedented system of "comfort women" to supply women as war munitions, crying that it was necessary to gratify sexual demands of soldiers in order to retain their war zeal and combat capacity.
   Women of Korea and other countries, more than 200,000, were "hunted" and enlisted as "comfort women." the Japanese imperialists locked them in wooden brothels. A woman was raped by 20 to 40 Japanese beasts every day. In case "comfort women" refused to obey, they dismembered their limbs or gouged out their breasts, thus killing them. They regarded it as their pleasure.
   It is not accidental that the entire humankind feels indignant at the crimes concerning the "comfort women."
   How to liquidate bestial crimes and disgraceful past of Japan today when the 21st century is coming is considered a touchstone for determining qualifications of the Japanese as human beings.
   The Japanese authorities must clearly know that without the sincere liquidation of their past, they cannot clear themselves of such a dishonor as a "filthy country" and "morally inferior country."
   Human conscience is following the attitude of Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on strengthening non-aligned movement
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean chief executive's "dialogue with people"
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today, commenting on the South Korean authority's recent "dialogue with people," says politics is not a waste of words.
   Though the South Korean economic situation has become all the more serious, he embellished the situation, alleging that the serious economic crisis has been brought under control and the economy improved, the daily says, and continued:
   In the "dialogue" he said the economic crisis can be straightened out and the unemployment problem solved only through the introduction of more foreign capital and the application of a lay-off system. His remark is really ludicrous. It is due to foreign capital that the South Korean economy has been ruined.
   He paid no concern to the national reunification issue but cried for "reciprocity" which is necessary between countries.
   His "dialogue with people" was aimed at pacifying public discontent, ensuring the "stability of the regime" and winning success in the forthcoming "local self-government election."

articles.title: All-embracing politics reflecting love for country, nation and people
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on strengthening non-aligned movement
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed article on strengthening and developing the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM).
   "Let Us Further Strengthen and Develop the NAM under the Banner of anti-Imperialist Independence", which is a call of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the DPRK, reflects the idea on further expanding and strengthening the NAM under the changed circumstance, the daily says, and goes on:
   What is important in strengthening the NAM at present is that the NAM should invariably adhere to the basic idea of anti-imperialist independence, strengthen its unity and cohesion, expand its ranks and develop South-South Cooperation.
   The non-aligned countries should steadily strengthen the Nam under the banner of anti-imperialist independence, not wavering under any complicated situation. 
   They should counter the divisive and alienation moves of the imperialists with the strategy of unity, settle  divergence of views and disputes on the principle of mutual respect, non-interference in other's internal affairs, equality and reciprocity and firmly unite with each other.
   Unity is the only way of strengthening the NAM and enhancing its position and role in the international arena. 
   It is also important to continue expanding its ranks. In expanding its ranks, it is imperative to appreciate and admit applicants with loyalty to its basic idea and principle as a criterion.
   If the non-aligned countries develop South-South Cooperation, they can develop the economy without recourse to the developed countries.
   Intensifying economic power is tantamount to the strengthening of resisting power  against the west.
   The Workers' Party and people of Korea will in the future, too, remain loyal to the basic idea and principle of the NAM and vigorously advance shoulder to shoulder with the non-aligned countries in the struggle to oppose imperialism and build a new independent world.

articles.title: Five-point policy, banner of Korea's reunification
articles.content:
All-embracing politics reflecting love for country, nation and people
Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully Through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation," a recent famous work of General Kim Jong Il, carries the idea of his all-embracing politics, says Rodong Sinmun in a signed article today.
   The daily quotes the work as saying:
   We will unite with anyone who aspires after the reunification of the country with national conscience, and join hands with him in the struggle for national reunification.
   The daily goes on:
   General Kim Jong Il's all-embracing politics is the politics of noble human love that embraces all people with loving care. It is the most magnanimous and patriotic politics that unites all classes and strata of the nation rock-firm for the common cause of the country and the nation.
   Steadfast are his faith and will to accomplish the cause of national reunification, the lifelong intention of President Kim Il Sung and the vital requirement of the nation, through the great unity of the entire nation in our generation.
   His faith and will produce the all-embracing politics of deep love for and trust in the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Tomb of King Tongmyong, founder of Koguryo
articles.content:
Five-point policy, banner of Korea's reunification
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Randriamvao Mahubazaka, General Secretary of the United Party of Struggle of Madagascar, made public a statement on May 5 supporting the five-point policy of great national unity advanced by General Kim Jong Il.
   In the statement, he said that the five-point policy is a library of great national unity and banner of Korea's reunification which indicates the way of accelerating national reunification through the great unity of the nation.
   He called upon all political parties, organisations and public figures in South Korea to turn out as one in the sacred struggle to achieve great national unity and Korea's reunification, upholding the five-point policy.
   He urged the new rulers of South Korea to discard the treacherous policy of dependence upon outside forces and take the road of national unity and reunification.
   He demanded that the United States abandon the anachronistic Korea policy, withdraw its troops from South Korea without delay and stop interfering in the internal affairs of Korea and obstructing Korea's reunification.
   The Central Committee of the Romanian Communist Party in a statement on May 4 expressed support for the five-point policy of the great unity of the Korean nation and declared that it would firmly stand by the side of the heroic Korean people fighting to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country against the anti-reunification moves of the U.S. and their stooges.

articles.title: Popular Susok resources
articles.content:
Tomb of King Tongmyong, founder of Koguryo 
Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The tomb of King Tongmyong (king of a bright country in the east) is located in Ryongsan-ri, Ryokpho district, Pyongyang.
   Tongmyong is the founder-king of Koguryo (B.C. 277-668), the first feudal state, the strongest in the Korean history. The tomb is one of the precious historical relics showing the outstanding architectural art and the time-honored cultural traditions of the Korean people.
   It was restored to its original state in May Juche 82 (1993). It occupies 220 hectares. There are Jongrung temple, vassal graves and Jinju pond in the tomb section.
   There are also the tomb (32 meters in width and length each and 11.5 meters in height) on  the foundation of more than 160  pieces of granite and dozens of stone sculptures depicting men and animals. Inside the tomb are a portrait of King Tongmyong and dozens of pictures showing the mightiness of Koguryo and people's customs.
   The gate (9 metrse in height) in front of the tomb, Jongrung temple and stone tower are as they were.
   Erected in front of the gate is the "monument to reconstruction of the tomb of King Tongmyong."
   A recreation ground has been built around the tomb.

articles.title: Statements of leader Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Popular Susok resources
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Korea is abundant in  Susok resources as it has many mountains, valleys, rivers and streams, long coastlines.
   Susok means natural rock  of ornamental and antiquarian value which  is shaped after being washed by water for a long time.
   Korea has formed the Susok association, a permanent body of the central committee of the Korean General Federation of Science and Technology in order to make an efficient use of Susok resources.
   The association is carrying on active prospecting work across the country on the basis of settling a geological premise on Susok. And it is arranging Susok exhibition halls in different places and disseminating science and technology on Susok. 
   Displayed at a recent exhibition in Pyongyang were more than 200 pieces of Susok found throughout the country. These are various in size and form, drawing a particular attention for their ornamental and antiquarian value. Great valuable in particular are those  found in the basins of the River Ryesong in Kumchon county, North Hwanghae Province, and the River Rimjin in Poptong county, Kangwon Province. Among them are a rock giving a special show of a landscape of mountains and water with one or several waterfalls, a rock showing mountain peaks surrounding a lake and a rock showing human and animal figures.
   Kim Wan U, permanent vice-chairman of the Susok association, said that multifarious rocks of Korea will attract great popularity at home and abroad in the future.
